name: BAIACU: The Game
description:
A little game for Weekly Game Jam 107. The theme was "Don't Touch It".

It is still missing a soundtrack and SFX, I'm hoping to add them later, along with some much needed polish and more gameplay.

That said, I'm pretty happy about it, as an almost solo prototype made with almost no crunch in three days. The core gameplay is there and I think it might have some potential beyond this jam.

Feedback is much appreciated! Please let me know if you want feedback on one of your games too.

Made by me (kcabra) and Júlio Moraes (julioribeiiro)
